pullrequest.title: (For later review) Split the implementation of template functions

content.raw:
I hadn't noticed that comment by @carromj before, but I just saw it and responded:

* #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/pull-requests/250/added-cylinder-class/diff#comment-68799420

I don't think the relative order of headers matters, as long as the detail headers include their parent, which they should. So I think we could revert 81dd782
